name: legend-room-screenshot-engine
description: Puppeteer script to capture TradingView charts and upload to Cloudinary.

scripts.smoke: mkdir -p reports && node -e "const fs=require('fs');(async()=>{const p=require('puppeteer');const b=await p.launch({args:['--no-sandbox','--disable-setuid-sandbox']});const pg=await b.newPage();const html=fs.readFileSync('chart-template.html','utf-8');await pg.setContent(html,{waitUntil:'networkidle0'});await pg.screenshot({path:'reports/SMOKE.png'});await b.close();console.log('Wrote reports/SMOKE.png');})();"
